TopicTitle: modular battle tank parts and weaponized rockets

Articles.Content:
what I like about ksp is the part where you can build anything from rockets, to planes, to rovers, to replica cars, to new realistic cars, to oldsmobiles, to Apollo, to the iss, to the iyss, to Soyuz, and even boats. I have bd armory,but the parts only seem to fit on planes. I would like a mod that ads some parts that seem to have the armory parts fit on rockets, and some modular tank bits that aren't where everything is supposed to only fit in one,premade fashion

Edited December 28, 2014 by jake9039
